short_summary: Supply and installation of rooftop supplementary air conditioning system
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### Rooftop Supplementary Air Conditioner
#### GSIN/NIBS: None

##### Notice Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS4272296052
* **Publication Date:** October 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 14, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Tender Status:** Cancelled

##### Tender Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** None

##### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 31, 2024

##### Goods and Services Description

The Government of Canada is seeking offers from qualified Offerors for the supply and installation of a rooftop supplementary air conditioning system into a 2019 Ford E450 Inmate Escort Vehicle, including ductwork to the inmate cell units, for Correctional Service Canada, in Joyceville, Ontario.

##### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** David Barltrop
* **Email Address:** david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17799231?extsite=MTc3OTkyMzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17799231?extsite=MTc3OTkyMzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note that I corrected the dialect errors and polished the writing to create a cleaner and more concise piece. I also reorganized the details to better match the typical structure you'll encounter in Canadian tender announcements.
